channel.title: Microsoft for Developers
channel.description: Get the latest information, insights, and news from Microsoft.

item.title: 【The case of the crash on a null pointer even though we checked it for null】即使我们检查了null的零件，坠机指针上的崩溃案件即
item.description: 【A colleague was investigating a crash. The stack at the point of the crash looks like this: contoso!winrt::impl::consume_Windows_Foundation_Collections_IVectorView< winrt::Windows::Foundation::Collections::IVectorView<int>, int>::Size+0x30 contoso!winrt::Contoso::implementation::Widget::】一位同事正在调查撞车事故。坠机点的堆栈看起来像这样：contoso！winrt :: inmp.:: councume_windows_foundation_collections_ivectorview <winrt :: Windows :: Foundation :: Foundation :: collections :: collections :: IvectorView <int> <int>，int>，int>，int>，int>，size+0x30 contoso！

item.title: 【What’s New in vcpkg (August 2025)】VCPKG的新功能（2025年8月）
item.description: 【This blog post summarizes changes to the vcpkg package manager as part of the 2025.08.27 registry release as well as changes to vcpkg documentation throughout August. There were no tool chang】该博客文章总结了VCPKG软件包管理器的更改，作为2025.08.27注册表版本的一部分，以及整个8月的VCPKG文档的更改。没有工具chang

item.title: 【Build your own Microsoft Docs AI assistant with Azure Container Apps and Azure OpenAI】使用Azure容器应用程序和Azure Openai构建您自己的Microsoft Docs AI助手
item.description: 【Learn how to deploy a self-hosted AI assistant that leverages Microsoft Learn content via the Model Context Protocol (MCP) and Azure OpenAI. It’s fast, secure, and ready for developer use in real-world apps. Prerequisite】了解如何部署自托管的AI助手，该AI助手通过模型上下文协议（MCP）和Azure Openai来利用Microsoft学习内容。它是快速，安全的，并且可以在现实世界应用中使用开发人员使用。先决条件

item.title: 【🎉Enhancing security and streamlining configuration with Lab Secrets in Azure DevTest Labs】Azure DevTest实验室中的实验室秘密增强安全性和简化配置
item.description: 【For platform engineers, securely managing sensitive information across dev and test environments is a critical responsibility. Each workflow, from provisioning virtual machines to deploying artifacts and automating environment setup, often involves handling credentials, SSH keys, and API tokens.】对于平台工程师，在开发环境和测试环境中安全管理敏感信息是一项至关重要的责任。从配置虚拟机到部署工件和自动化环境设置的每个工作流程通常都涉及处理凭据，SSH键和API令牌。

item.title: 【How can I write a C++/WinRT IAsyncOperation where T is not a Windows Runtime type?, part 2】如何编写C ++/Winrt iaSyncoperation 其中 t 不是Windows运行时类型？，第2部分
item.description: 【Last time, we smuggled an arbitrary C++ value inside an IInspectable but noted the lack of safety. So let's add some safety. To ensur】上次，我们走私了一个可观的C ++值，但注意到缺乏安全性。因此，让我们添加一些安全性。确保

item.title: 【Make Sense of Your Output Window with Copilot】用副驾驶员弄清输出窗口
item.description: 【Ever found yourself staring at the Output Window, overwhelmed by endless lines of logs and cryptic messages? You're】有没有发现自己盯着输出窗口，被无尽的日志和隐秘消息淹没了吗？ 你

item.title: 【New Test Run Hub in Azure Test Plans】Azure测试计划中的新测试中心
item.description: 【Delivering high-quality software is a necessity and that’s why Azure Test Plans has introduced the all-new Test Run Hub, an enabler for teams who want to take control of their testing process and drive continuous improvement.】提供高质量的软件是必要的，这就是为什么Azure测试计划推出了全新的测试枢纽，这是想要控制其测试过程并推动持续改进的团队的推动力。

item.title: 【Dev Proxy v1.1 with improved support for Microsoft Graph batching】开发代理v1.1，并改善了对Microsoft Graph批处理的支持
item.description: 【We're excited to announce the release of Dev Proxy v1.1. This update delivers critical fixes for Microsoft Graph batch request simulation, resolves authentication plugin issues, and enhances the MinimalPermissionsGuidancePlugin with new reporting capabilities. In this version: Fixed Microsoft Graph batch response handling】我们很高兴宣布发行Dev Proxy v1.1。此更新为Microsoft Graph Batch请求模拟提供了关键修复，解决了身份验证插件问题，并通过新的报告功能增强了最小的PermissionsGuidancePlugin。在此版本中：固定的Microsoft Graph批处理响应处理

item.title: 【Go 1.25.1-1 and 1.24.7-1 Microsoft builds now available】GO 1.25.1-1和1.24.7-1 Microsoft现在可用
item.description: 【A new release of the Microsoft build of Go including security fixes is now available for download. For more information about this release and the changes included, see the table below: Microsoft Release Upstream Tag】现在可以下载Microsoft Go Build的新版本。有关此版本和包括更改的更多信息，请参见下表：Microsoft版本上游标签

item.title: 【Let Copilot Coding Agent handle the busy work】让Copilot编码代理处理繁忙的工作
item.description: 【The GitHub Copilot Coding Agent changes how .NET developers get work done. Beyond inline suggestions, it can analyze your repo, plan multi‑step tasks, create issues and pull requests, and carry changes across projects—all in the cloud. In this post, we’ll show two concrete scenarios using the eShopLite sample: automatically creating miss】GitHub副副代理改变了.NET开发人员完成工作的方式。除了内联建议之外，它可以分析您的回购，计划多步骤任务，创建问题并提取请求，并在项目中进行更改 - 所有这些都在云中。在这篇文章中，我们将使用Eshoplite样本显示两个具体方案：自动创建MISS
